component.name: DNxHD Transcoder
component.summary: Easy DNxHD/DNxHR video transcoding for MOV and MXF

description.p: DNxHD Transcoder is a graphical utility for converting video files to the DNxHD or DNxHR format in MOV or MXF containers, with support for audio normalization, FPS, and metadata options. It provides an intuitive drag-and-drop interface and builds on ffmpeg with a modern GTK4 GUI.
